testsuite.name: CoffeeMachineTest
testsuite.system-out:
An espresso should be as number 1 in the list, a latte as number 2 and a cappuccino as number 3. Options also should be named as "buy", "fill", "take".
The coffee machine has: 400 of water 540 of milk 120 of coffee beans 9 of disposable cups 550 of money
